data.title: SHIPYARD OLD PORT HALF MARATHON & 5K RACE DETAILS
data.meta_description: The Old Port Half Marathon & 5K starts and finishes between Spring and Union Street. For additional live race details, click to learn more or sign up today.
data.text:
The Old Port Half Marathon & 5K starts and finishes between Spring Street and Union Street. Start time for the half marathon is at 7:00 AM with the 5K starting at 7:35 AM on Saturday, June 7th. We’ll be updating this website regularly with live race details, so be sure to check back periodically for up-to-date information.

HALF MARATHON

START TIME – 7:00 AM

The Shipyard Old Port Half features a single-loop course with jaw-dropping views of the Casco Bay followed by a rockin’ block party in the heart of Portland’s historic Old Port district!

Pacer Groups Provided (hrs): 1:30, 1:40, 1:50, 2:00, 2:10, 2:20, 2:30, 2:40, 2:50, and 3:00.

Old Port Half Marathon awards to the following: Awards are given to the top 3 men and women overall, and the top 3 men and women in the following age groups: 19 & under, 20-29, 30-39, 40-49, 50-59, 60-69, and 70+.

View Interactive Google Map.

View the Half Marathon Course Elevation Gain.

5K

START TIME – 7:35 AM

The Shipyard Old Port 5K features a single-loop course that is completely closed to traffic. From the start in the heart of the historic Old Port district, you’ll run along beautiful tree-lined streets filled with 19th-century homes and buildings while gradually climbing 75 feet in the first mile to the course’s highest point. From there, you’ll drop down to sea level where you’ll enjoy running along Portland’s waterfront and back into the Old Port.

Awards are given to the top 3 men and women overall, and in the following age groups: 14 & under, 15-19, 20-29, 30-39, 40-49, 50-59, 60-69, and 70+.

PACKET PICK-UP

Packet pickup will be held at The Cross Insurance Arena located at 1 Civic Center Square, Portland, ME 04101 on Friday, June 6th from 12 PM to 8 PM. Race day packet pick up will be available for half marathon runners from 530 AM to 630 AM and 5k runners from 530 AM to 7 AM.

Save time on packet pickup by adding on packet mailing at registration! Already registered? Don’t worry! You can add it on through your EnMotive account. Please note, we are unable to mail out packets after the packet mailing deadline has passed.

DIRECTIONS & PARKING

The race starts and finishes on Spring Street between Center Street and Union Street. Please arrive by 6 AM to ensure you have time to park, check-in, and stretch before the race begins at 7:00 AM. You can park in nearby parking lots or garages. Many lots are open 24 hours a day and utilize a self-serve parking kiosk that requires a credit card. Click the map to see an interactive version!

Elite Runners Perks

If you’ve achieved an exceptionally low finish time at marathon or half marathon in the past 18 months, we have a perk for you! Elite runners who meet the qualifying standards below are eligible for a fully comped entry to this year’s race! To apply for a fully comped entry as an elite athlete, please click the apply today bottom below to submit your application!

Standards for both the marathon and half marathon must have been run within 18 months of the 2024 race day to qualify. Elite athlete support (travel, lodging, prize money, and/or food assistance) will not be provided by Ventures Endurance.

Applications must be submitted no later than 30 days prior to the event. Late entries may be accommodated on a case by case basis. If an event sells out and is at capacity, additional elite athlete entries will not be considered. An elite complimentary entry is non transferrable and only applied to the Half Marathon and Marathon distances. Other distances do not qualify.
